summary: ICP canister-based web app scaffolded with Motoko backend and React/Vite frontend, including Internet Identity authentication, core UI shell/branding, and initial Customers and Invoices CRUD-style pages.

existing_features.title: Motoko backend canister scaffold
existing_features.description: Initial Motoko backend setup with candid bindings and project build/deploy configuration for ICP.

existing_features.title: React + Vite frontend scaffold
existing_features.description: Frontend application scaffold including routing/layout shell, Tailwind setup, and build tooling.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication integration
existing_features.description: Client hooks and configuration to authenticate users via Internet Identity and create an authenticated actor for backend calls.

existing_features.title: Backend client + typed declarations
existing_features.description: Typed frontend bindings and client utilities for calling the backend canister (generated .did JS/TS and helper client).

existing_features.title: App shell with branding assets
existing_features.description: Core UI shell components and generated brand images (logo, header banner, icons) wired into the frontend.

existing_features.title: Shadcn UI component library integrated
existing_features.description: Large set of reusable UI primitives (buttons, dialogs, forms, tables, etc.) added to the frontend component library.

existing_features.title: Customers feature pages and form
existing_features.description: Initial Customers feature implementation including types, queries, list page and create/edit form UI.

existing_features.title: Invoices feature pages and editor
existing_features.description: Initial Invoices feature implementation including list/detail pages, invoice form, and line item editor UI with types and queries.

existing_features.title: Client-side query key and storage utilities
existing_features.description: Shared utilities for stable query keys and local/persistent client storage helpers used across features.

existing_features.title: Build template and deployment scripts
existing_features.description: Project build template files (Dockerfile, scripts, workspace config, ICP yaml/canister configs) to support repeatable builds and deployment.

existing_features.title: Update the app header brand mark to use the user-provided attached image ("Queen Bee Guitar Repair 3.png") instead of the current inline SVG icon, keeping the same visual size (64x64) and layout spacing in the header.
Add and wire up favicon assets derived from the attached logo so the browser tab/favicon reflects the updated branding.
Store the generated branding images as static frontend assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the UI (do not serve images via the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Update app icon/branding to use the user-provided attached image as the icon.

architectural_notes: Frontend uses React + Vite with Tailwind and shadcn/ui component primitives.
Authentication is handled via Internet Identity; frontend creates an authenticated canister actor for API calls.
Feature structure introduced for Customers and Invoices with colocated types/queries/components.
Typed canister bindings (.did JS/TS) are included for frontend-backend integration.
Build/deploy templating added (Dockerfile/scripts/icp yaml) for reproducible ICP builds.
Build template expanded to include full React/Vite + Tailwind + shadcn/ui starter with ICP canister configs and workspace packaging.
Custom frontend ESLint rules added to enforce stable query keys (no bigint) and required Internet Identity provider configuration.
Image asset tooling added (resize/prune scripts) for generated branding assets in the build template.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Square favicon image based on the attached crowned bee artwork (queen-bee-favicon.dim_32x32.png)
- Square favicon image based on the attached crowned bee artwork (queen-bee-favicon.dim_48x48.png)
- Square app icon image based on the attached crowned bee artwork (queen-bee-app-icon.dim_180x180.png)

## Edit Images
- Replace the existing logo artwork with the attached crowned bee mark, centered and cleanly cropped for a square logo (queen-bee-guitar-repair-logo.dim_512x512.png > queen-bee-guitar-repair-logo.dim_512x512.png)

generatedImages.description: Square favicon image based on the attached crowned bee artwork
Square favicon image based on the attached crowned bee artwork
Square app icon image based on the attached crowned bee artwork
Replace the existing logo artwork with the attached crowned bee mark, centered and cleanly cropped for a square logo

projectName: Replace app header icon with the attached Queen Bee logo image
